name: Drytron Nu2
text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned by a card effect. You cannot Ritual Summon monsters the turn you activate either of this card's effects, except Machine monsters. You can only use each of the following effects of "Drytron Nu2" once per turn. If there is a "Drytron" card on the field: You can Special Summon this card from your hand or GY, but banish it when it leaves the field. If this card is Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Drytron" monster from your Deck to your hand, except "Drytron Nu2".
